choices.B: Navigate to Leads, select the appropriate Lead View, click on Run Report, and select Lead Source Effectiveness.
choices.A: Navigate to Leads, click on Insights, then select the Lead Source Effectiveness tab.
choices.C: Navigate to Contacts, select the appropriate Contact View, click on Run Report, and select Lead Source Effectiveness.
choices.D: Under Customer Journeys, go to the insights section for each journey that generates Leads, download the appropriate data, and aggregate it into a separate spreadsheet.
